entry.title: $1950 // Massive 1 bed!PRIME BUSHWICK!Outdoor space,Laundry in bldg!
entry.content:
Building Amenities: Bike Storage, Laundry In Building, Roof Deck

Unit Amenities: Private Terrace

Public Unit Description:

1 bedroom with outdoor space .

This 1 bedroom apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedroom, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. Private terrace
You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.

Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only 2 blocks to the central ave station

MUST HAVE RENTERS INSURANCE!

To schedule viewing contact show contact info
